definition[0]: a large stone building with four triangular (=three-sided) walls that slope in to a point at the top, especially in Egypt and Central America
definition[1]: a system, society, company etc that is organized in different levels, so that there is a small number of people at the top and a much larger number of people at the bottom
example[0]: different levels of the management pyramid
example[1]: At the bottom of the pyramid are the poor.
definition[2]: a pile of objects that have been put into the shape of a pyramid
definition[3]: an object shaped like a pyramid
definition[4]: an organization with only a few people at the top, who have a lot of power and influence over those below them
